about_the_game:
FILTER brings accessibility to fast paced 2.5D Action Platform Fighters. Offering an array of advanced yet accessible movement techniques from Wave Dashing to Ledge Cancels. FILTER's movement system is easy to pick up for newcomers but offers a depth of mastery that will satisfy even the most seasoned players.

Online and Local PvP Gameplay


With a rollback netcode at its core, FILTER offers a smooth online experience. Whether you're casual or competitive, you'll find your match here. Create custom matches with your friends or enjoy a match anytime with quickplay.

Immersive Singleplayer Campaign

Beyond its competitive aspect, FILTER offers a repayable single-player campaign with hidden secrets and collectables. Traverse through levels, encounter bosses, unearth rare cosmetics, and uncover a compelling story. There are also variety of challenges and skill-based mini-games including timed target mode.

Customization and Uniqueness


Make your fighter truly yours by delving into FILTER's costume customization options. A wide variety of unlockable skins, emotes, and other cosmetic items are at your disposal.

Diverse Gameplay Modes


No matter your familiarity with Platform Fighters, FILTER has something for everyone. For newcomers, the easy-to-grasp control scheme ensures you won't be left behind. Veterans will appreciate the game's depth to refine movement and combos.

Transparent and Fair System


FILTER uses a fair, skill-based reward system. All customization items can be earned just by playing the game, ensuring a level playing field for everyone.

short_description: FILTER merges fast-paced 2.5D action with advanced, yet accessible, movement mechanics. Online PvP with rollback netcode and modding support caters to both casual and hardcore players. For those less inclined towards competition, the game also offers a rich campaign with unlockable customizations.
